title: Musk tweeted an employee’s Slack message. How to protect your work chats.
description: Your boss may have access to your chats, messages and emails at the workplace. But there are ways to protect yourself.

title: Nibel gave Twitter a lot for little in return
description: Elon Musk and monetization woes drove a prominent gaming Twitter user away. The departure is emblematic of the platform's bigger problems.

title: Call of Duty teases the return of gaming’s most controversial level
description: The end of “Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II” sets up the return of longtime franchise villain Makarov and references the notorious No Russian mission.

title: As midterms loom, TikTok faces its next political test
description: A new study shows that a third of political candiates facing voters on Nov. 8 have TikTok accounts.

title: If your phone needs fixing, make sure your secrets are safe first
description: It happens to the best of us, and getting it repaired shouldn't be hard. Just make sure your personal data is safe first.

title: Musk’s inner circle worked through weekend to cement Twitter layoff plans
description: Elon Musk plans to cut Twitter's workforce just days after taking control of the company.
